qas.question: Who arrived in Jamestown during their solo round the world voyage?
When did Joshua Slocum arrive in Jamestown?
When did Joshua Slocum depart from Jamestown to continue his trip?
Who presented two lectures on their voyage?

context: On <a1_0>11 April 1898<a1_0/> American <a0_0>Joshua Slocum<a0_0/>, on his famous and epic solo round the world voyage arrived at Jamestown. He departed on <a2_0>20 April 1898<a2_0/> for the final leg of his circumnavigation having been extended hospitality from the governor, his Excellency <a3_0>Sir R A Standale<a3_0/>, presented two lectures on his voyage and been invited to Longwood by the French Consular agent.
